title: 澄清产品需求
situation: An engineer asks how a feature should work. You'll write a PRD and share for review.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 这个功能具体要怎么做？
turns.pinyin: Zhège gōngnéng jùtǐ yào zěnme zuò?
turns.translation: How exactly should this feature work?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 我先写一份PRD，週五前发给大家评审。
turns.pinyin: Wǒ xiān xiě yī fèn PRD, zhōuwǔ qián fā gěi dàjiā píngshěn.
turns.translation: I'll write a PRD first and send it for review by Friday.
suggestions: 我先写一份PRD，週五前发给大家评审。
我整理成PRD，週五前发出来给大家看。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.pinyin: Píngshěn huì shì zhōuwǔ xiàwǔ ma?
turns.translation: Is the review meeting Friday afternoon?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 对，週五下午三点，我发会议邀请。
turns.pinyin: Duì, zhōuwǔ xiàwǔ sān diǎn, wǒ fā huìyì yāoqǐng.
turns.translation: Yes, Friday 3pm. I'll send the meeting invite.
suggestions: 对，週五下午三点，我发会议邀请。
嗯，週五三点，我会发calendar invite。
